tool_description: Steam video games and game developers/publishers database - API
name: Steam
title: Steam

api_list.name: Publisher/developer by name
api_list.description: - Search publisher/developer and get an object of data with company logo, banner, list of featured games.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://steam41.p.rapidapi.com/developer/capcom"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "steam41.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search game by game title
api_list.description:
- Sends an array of games related to the searched game title.
- array contains objects of game data.
- maximum number of games in the array can be 15.
- shows error 404 if the array is empty and 0 number of games found related to the searched game title
